mms.controller.interfaces

Interface IAdminFilmController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdminFilmController

    public interface IAdminFilmController
    Interface that define the AdminFilmController.
    Author:
    Luca Pascucci, Filippo Nicolini, Alessandro Bagnoli
